sn21.5:1.2: Atha kho ayasma sujato yena bhagava tenupasankami.
sn21.5:1.3: Addasa kho bhagava ayasmantam sujatam duratova agacchantam.
sn21.5:1.6: yanca abhirupo dassaniyo pasadiko paramaya vannapokkharataya samannagato, yassa catthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti tadanuttaram brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati”ti.
